name: Challenged Athletes Foundation Grants
description: Grants for adaptive sports equipment and athletic expenses
fullDescription: The Challenged Athletes Foundation provides grants for adaptive sports equipment, training, and competition expenses to individuals with physical disabilities.
whatTheyOffer:
- Grants for adaptive sports equipment
- Funding for athletic prosthetics
- Support for competition travel expenses
- Training and coaching expense grants
- Adaptive sport wheelchairs
- Handcycles, sit-skis, and more
howToGetIt:
1. Visit challengedathletes.org
2. Review grant categories and eligibility
3. Complete online grant application
4. Submit supporting documentation
5. Applications reviewed quarterly
6. Must have permanent physical disability
keywords: Challenged Athletes Foundation, CAF, grant, adaptive sports, prosthetics, wheelchair, disability, athletics
